subject: p14387068
History: Failed extubation, status post TIPS. Patient with HCV cirrhosis.
Findings: ET tube is in standard position. The tip is 56 cm above the carina. Large right hydropneumothorax and collapse of the right lung is unchanged. There is mild vascular congestion seen in the left lung. The cardiomediastinum is midline. Right basal pigtail catheter is in place.
